trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Identifica uma célula na grade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> pode ser usado em conjunto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propriedade para obter ou definir o valor de qualquer célula.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> faz com que o foco mover para a célula especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> and returns the column and row number of the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> e retorna o número de linha e coluna da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is also printed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor armazenado no <xref:System.Data.DataTable> também será impressa usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The number of a row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de uma linha no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de uma coluna no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> and sets the new instance to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> e define a nova instância para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de uma coluna no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of the column.
trans-unit.target: O número da coluna.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> valor para especificar um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> no <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.

trans-unit.source: The value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is returned by specifying <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O valor armazenado no <xref:System.Data.DataTable> é retornado com a especificação de <xref:System.Data.DataRow> e <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objetos por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: An object you are to comparing.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que você está comparando.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> is identical to a second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> é idêntico a um segundo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o segundo objeto for idêntico ao primeiro, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir compara dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash value that can be added to a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor de hash que pode ser adicionado a um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.

trans-unit.source: A number that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.
trans-unit.target: Um número que identifica exclusivamente o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds the hash value of the selected cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir adiciona o valor de hash da célula selecionada em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> o controle para um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de uma linha no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> valor para especificar um <xref:System.Data.DataRow> no <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associados a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> and returns the value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir atribui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> e retorna o valor armazenado no <xref:System.Data.DataTable> do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número da linha e o número da coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row number and column number.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o número da linha e o número da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following example returns the row number of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir retorna o número de linha de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ToString%2A> método.
